channel.title: Whats the Total EXP at lvl 100? It does show it if you're wondering
channel.description:
Whats the Total EXP at lvl 100? It does show it if you're wondering.
When you're lvl 99, it shows that you can get to lvl 100 at 14 something million exp. What's the exact exp to get there? Does anyone know? If you do, please post.

item.title: Whats the Total EXP at lvl 100? It does show it if you're wondering
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

leader:

Well, you need to have level 87 attack, strength, defense and hitpoints to be lvl 100.

I didn’t mean combat, I meant any skill lvl at lvl 99 will show exp to the next lvl which is 100.

[quote=“bullzeye, post:3, topic:28495”]I’m not sure, but I know it’s not possible to get. It’s more than 200 million. 200 million is the max you can get.

EDIT: No actually BobDole’s right (as usual). But you can pass it and not get to level 100. Pretty funny :D[/quote]
I was about to say what you editted.

BobDole81:

Assuming the Rs2 formula is the same as Rsc, it’s 14,391,160 xp

Thanks Bob, that’s just what I needed!

~Ron

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the Total EXP at lvl 100? It does show it if you're wondering

item.title: Whats the Total EXP at lvl 100? It does show it if you're wondering
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

I’m not sure, but I know it’s not possible to get. It’s more than 200 million. 200 million is the max you can get.

EDIT: No actually BobDole’s right (as usual). But you can pass it and not get to level 100. Pretty funny
